titleStmt.title: The contentes of thys booke The first is a letter which was wroten vnto the faythfull followers of Christes gospell. Also an other treatyse called the Myrrour or glasse to know thyself. Here vnto is added a propre instruction, teaching a man to dye gladly, and not to feare death.
Contentes of thys boke.
titleStmt.author: Frith, John, 1503-1533.

titleStmt.title: The contentes of thys booke The first is a letter which was wroten vnto the faythfull followers of Christes gospell. Also an other treatyse called the Myrrour or glasse to know thyself. Here vnto is added a propre instruction, teaching a man to dye gladly, and not to feare death.
Contentes of thys boke.
titleStmt.author: Frith, John, 1503-1533.
